entry.title: Jekyll Special Blocks
entry.summary: Overview If you are using a Jekyll website to create your own GitHub Pages website where your site is hosted on USERNAME.github.io for free, here’s an interesting tip for creating blocks of interest that catch your readers eye. Specifically, this website for example uses chirpy-starter which I learned about from TechnoTim: The Blocks Using these technolgies, you can create blocks like thi...
